response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product not only stands as a testament to innovation but also offers unparalleled performance and durability. Given its exceptional quality, I believe it would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. I am offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $18,000, a discount reflecting my confidence in its value to you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. I look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 18000}
